trans-unit.source: Light object that projects its effect along a direction specified by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 沿著 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 指定的方向投射其效果的光源物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight> objects have no position in space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight> 物件有空間中的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a light that projects its effect along a direction specified by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />..
trans-unit.target: 建構燈光，這個燈光會沿著 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 指定的方向投射其效果。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect in a specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 建立燈光的執行個體，這個執行個體會以指定的方向投射其效果。

trans-unit.source: This contructor creates an instance of a white light projected along a Vector3D of value `(0,0,-1)`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式建立執行個體值的 Vector3D 沿著預計有白色淺色`(0,0,-1)`。

trans-unit.source: DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
trans-unit.target: DirectionalLights 有方向，但沒有空間中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt creates a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼摘錄建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>。

trans-unit.source: Diffuse color of the new light.
trans-unit.target: 新燈光的擴散色彩。

trans-unit.source: Direction of the new light.
trans-unit.target: 新燈光的方向。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect along a specified Vector3D with a specified color.
trans-unit.target: 建立燈光的執行個體，這個執行個體會使用指定的色彩，沿著指定的 Vector3D 投射其效果。

trans-unit.source: DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
trans-unit.target: DirectionalLights 有方向，但沒有空間中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt creates a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼摘錄建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能已不能再解析)，但不會複製動畫或其目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the vector along which the light's effect will be seen on models in a 3-D scene.
trans-unit.target: 表示向量，燈光的效果將沿著這個向量投射在 3D 場景中的模型上。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D along which the light projects, and which must have a non-zero magnitude.
trans-unit.target: 燈光投射時所遵循的 Vector3D 方向，這個向量的大小不能是零。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>(0,0,-1)</c>.
Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight.Direction" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight.Direction" /> 相依性屬性。
